title: A5 (Croatia)
summary: The A5 motorway (Croatian: Autocesta A5) is a motorway in Croatia spanning 59 kilometres (37 mi).[1] It connects Osijek, the largest city in Slavonia region, to the Croatian motorway network at the Sredanci interchange of the A3 motorway.[2] The A5 represents a significant north–south transportation corridor in Croatia and is a part of the European route E73.[3] The A5 motorway route also follows Pan-European corridor Vc.[4] In addition to Osijek, the A5 motorway also passes near Đakovo.[5]
